pageProduct.name: Zyrtec Hayfever Antihistamine for Kids Oral Drops 20mL
pageProduct.description:
Information

Want to skip the suffering?

Zyrtec? Kids sugar free oral drops provides fast, long lasting relief for hayfever and allergy symptoms for your little one 1 year and above.

As one of Australia's leading Allergy brands Zyrtec? believes all Australians should be able to live life to the fullest, regardless of allergies. Zyrtec? relieves symptoms for seasonal and year-round hayfever & allergy sufferers.

It provides fast relief allowing your little one to enjoy their day - Skip the suffering and get back to life fast!

Why choose Zyrtec?

Long lasting

Zyrtec? Kids sugar fee oral drops for ages 1 year and above, provide fast relief for up to 12 hours.

Rapid relief

Relieves hayfever & allergy symptoms

? Sneezing

? Runny nose, itchy nose

? Itchy, red, watery eyes

?? Hives/itchy skin

Kind to kids

? Sugar free

? Lactose free

? Gluten free

Why do I have allergies?

What are allergies?

Allergies are triggered when your immune system overreacts to normally harmless substances called allergens. Your body releases chemicals, one of which is called histamine. Histamine is responsible for causing most of your symptoms.

How do antihistamines work?

Antihistamines work by blocking the site where histamines bind to which help stop an allergy response. Zyrtec? contains the antihistamine cetirizine which provides fast, 12 hour symptom relief.

Indoor allergies

Include mould, dust, and pet dander and can cause allergy symptoms at home and at work. Since indoor allergies can take effect any time of year. Understanding and recognizing the symptoms is half the battle when fighting indoor allergies.

Outdoor allergies

Produced by plants, trees, grass, and weeds. Pollen, the most common outdoor allergen, is lightweight and can easily become airborne. Pollination plays a key role in the spread of outdoor allergens.

Allergy Myth-Busting

MYTH: All antihistamines make you drowsy

BUSTED: While some older antihistamines can cause drowsiness (the ones behind the counter), newer antihistamines are classed as less sedating antihistamines, meaning they are less likely to cause drowsiness

MYTH: You can build tolerance to antihistamines (AH)

BUSTED: Changes in air pollution, air temperature, increased exposure to allergens and development of new allergies may make it seem like AH are not working as well as before.

MYTH: You shouldn't take antihistamines daily.

BUSTED: Antihistamines such as Zyrtec, are indicated for the relief of hayfever and allergy symptoms and can be taken once a day to provide relief from allergy symptoms.

MYTH: Allergies are harmless.

BUSTED: Allergies are a prevalent problem in Australia and should not be ignored. Untreated allergies have a significant impact on quality of life in regards to sleep quality and daily functioning.

General Information

Zyrtec Cetirizine Kids Fast Acting Relief Sugar Free is an oral drops that relieves hayfever and allergy symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes/itchy eyes, hives and itchy skin rash.

Zyrtec Kids Fast Acting Relief Hayfever and Allergy relief. This Zyrtec hayfever medicine is an oral liquid that relieves hayfever and allergy symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes/itchy eyes, hives and itchy skin rash.

Suitable for children aged 1+
Sugar free

Suitable For: For kids one year and over.

Size: 20mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Allergy & Hayfever Oral Liquid
• Ages 1+
• Sugar Free

Warnings

Do not use.
- In infants under 12 months of age.
- If hypersensitive to any of the ingredients.
- If ring is separated from cap.

Ask your doctor before use.
- In children under 2 years.
- In children with liver or kidney disease.

Directions

If you know your child's weight, choose the dose for that weight rather than according to the child's age.

Age (years): 1-3
Weight: up to 14
How much: 4 drops
How often: Twice a day as necessary. Maximum of 2 doses in 24 hours.

Age (years): 3 - 5
Weight:14 - 18
How much: 5 drops
How often: Twice a day as necessary. Maximum of 2 doses in 24 hours.

Age (years): 5 - 6
Weight: 18 - 22
How much: 6 drops
How often: Twice a day as necessary. Maximum of 2 doses in 24 hours.

Age (years): 5 - 6
Weight: 22 - 26
How much: 7 drops
How often: Twice a day as necessary. Maximum of 2 doses in 24 hours.

Age (years): 5 - 6
Weight: 26 - 30
How much: 8 drops
How often: Twice a day as necessary. Maximum of 2 doses in 24 hours.

Age (years): Over 6
Weight: Over 30
How much: 10 drops
How often: Twice a day as necessary. Maximum of 2 doses in 24 hours.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.
